channel.title: AGAIN: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
channel.description:
okay so basically it makes its own shape by itself, im trying to make a shape myself instead of this shape coming up all the time when i click to drag in order to make a shape of my own. looka here, it makes an annoying shape that wont go away, im suppose to be able to drag it so it can make the right size and shape i want it to be -.-:
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/64gwet/4]View My Video[/URL]

item.title: AGAIN: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

That video did nothing really to show what is going on. For one thing we don’t know exactly what tool you’re using to make that shape. Second we can’t see any of the settings applied to the tool when making the shape. So basically you’re not helping us help you at all. A picture would’ve been better than a low res video.

So why don’t you try asking for help again, and well go from there.

Read full topic
item.source: AGAIN: Rounded rectangle tool making unwanted shape when clicking canvas
